name: Summer Beauty Gril Game
description:
Welcome to Summer Beauty Girl Game - a cool kid game!

Do you think you have the skills with Summer Beauty Girl Game - a cool kid game?

Do you miss summer days? Well, the sun will shine bright like a diamond soon. Let's dream about a sunny day at the beach! What would you wear? Put on your thinnest dress and take your beach bag with you! You can also dress up Emma to get inspired for a hot summer day by the sea!


Game features:

• Simple and easy to use!
• Great Graphics!
• Kids will love it and be entertained for ages!
• Cute and friendly design !
• Awesome Sounds and music!
• Beautiful graphics and characters!
• Catchy sounds and music!
• Easy game-play even for the smallest kids!
